titleStmt.title: An account of the behaviour of the fourteen late popish malefactors whil'st in Newgate and their discourses with the Ordinary ... : also a confutation of their appeals, courage, and cheerfulness at execution / by Samuel Smith ...
titleStmt.author: Smith, Samuel, 1620-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Parkhurst, Dorman Newman, Tho. Cockeril, and Tho. Simmons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
